reviews.review_msg: Not a very understanding/ supportive teacher. I was really disappointed with their assignments as it relied heavily on ChatGPT and not on the profs own skills at teaching. I would not take any of their courses again, which is disappointing as I really enjoy history and thought I would love this course.

Took this class as the last lower level history and it was nearly my last. Totally disorganised and lectures often never went anywhere. Her feminist bias and bizarre arguments ruined history for many  of us. If you like history avoid her like the plague.

Very approachable, makes Canadian History fun. Passion and hard work will lead to success.  Study tips... 1. Discuss the material with friends and family. It'll really help you remember all the information. 2. Take notes on every article under themes presented in lecture. These notes will be invaluable for tutorials and the final.
